Catalano.Imaging.Tools

Class HistogramOfOrientedGradients

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Tools.HistogramOfOrientedGradients

  • public class HistogramOfOrientedGradients
extends java.lang.Object
    Histograms of Oriented Gradients. References: Navneet Dalal and Bill Triggs, "Histograms of Oriented Gradients for Human Detection", CVPR 2005. Available at: http://lear.inrialpes.fr/people/triggs/pubs/Dalal-cvpr05.pdf
